data.name: What Lies in the Multiverse - Artbook
data.detailed_description: The Art of What Lies in the Multiverse is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 48 pages of artwork from the team at Studio Voyager and IguanaBee. See the wonderful and charming pixel art process unfold from each page to the next covering environments, characters, objects, lighting and more.
data.about_the_game: The Art of What Lies in the Multiverse is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 48 pages of artwork from the team at Studio Voyager and IguanaBee. See the wonderful and charming pixel art process unfold from each page to the next covering environments, characters, objects, lighting and more.
data.short_description: The Art of What Lies in the Multiverse is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 48 pages of artwork from the team at Studio Voyager and IguanaBee. See the wonderful and charming pixel art process unfold from each page to the next covering environments, characters, objects, lighting and more.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
